17:55 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> hello! I just upgraded to xwiki 8.4.3. I have a new home dashboard when going to the root URL (Main.WebHome). I tried to switch it to another page in Administration -> Wikis -> Descriptor in the Home Page field, but it does not seem to work. Am I missing something?  
18:10 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> I used the redirect trick from this page for now: https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/How+to+change+the+home+page+destination
